original_text: She did not realize that I was the one who gave her everything that she needed. I gave her grain, wine and olive oil. I even gave her lots of silver and gold. But she used my gifts to worship Baal instead of me.
korean_text: 곡식과 새 포도주와 기름은 내가 그에게 준 것이요 그들이 바알을 위하여 쓴 은과 금도 내가 그에게 더하여 준 것이거늘 그가 알지 못하도다

sentences.original_text: that I was the one who gave her everything
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그녀에게 모든 것을 주었다는 사실을

sentences.original_text: I gave her grain, wine and olive oil
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그녀에게 곡물과 포도주와 올리브유를 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: I even gave her lots of silver and gold
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 심지어 그녀에게 많은 은과 금도 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: to worship Baal instead of me
sentences.korean_translation: 나를 숭배하는 대신 바알을 숭배하기 위해
